radiusContent.title: Create beacons
radiusContent.description: Light up your gaming location, show the world where you're playing and make lifelong friends

radiusContent.title: Show-off your skill level
radiusContent.description: Every gamer has a skill level from newbie to pro. Flaunt yours and connect with your tribe.

radiusContent.title: Supercharge the gaming revolution
radiusContent.description: Rent out your consoles and games through us. You get paid while fuelling someone’s passion.

radiusContent.title: Build the local community
radiusContent.description: We have hid behind Reddit and Discord usernames for long enough. Be bold, bring out the real you.

radiusContent.title: Engage with your favourite publishers
radiusContent.description: Nab free game licenses, exclusive items, virtual currency, subscriptions, discounts and more.

vidquestContent.title: Maximize your applicant pool’s value
vidquestContent.description: Your large applicant pool is a moat. Don’t ignore a large fraction of it - Give every candidate a chance.

vidquestContent.title: Redefine interview efficiency
vidquestContent.description: You don’t have to match every minute from the candidate with a minute of yours. Get ready to scale.

vidquestContent.title: AI-enhanced Questions
vidquestContent.description: Get question ideas generated by AI from the candidate’s resume or pen down your own.

vidquestContent.title: Time-stamps and Highlights
vidquestContent.description: Get a timestamped transcript of the candidate’s interview along with AI-curated highlights.

vidquestContent.title: Stay reassured with product excellence
vidquestContent.description: We ensure that the user experience is welcoming to candidates and take effort to eliminate undesirable dropoffs.
